Package stincmale.ratmex.meter

Class SpinLockStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • stincmale.ratmex.meter.SpinLockStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LockStrategy

    @ThreadSafe
public final class SpinLockStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements LockStrategy
    This implementation of LockStrategy does not distinguish shared and exclusive locking. An AtomicBoolean is used as a state of this lock, and blocking is implemented via a WaitStrategy.

      SpinLockStrategy​(WaitStrategy waitStrategy)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isSharedLocked​()  
      long lock​()
      Exclusively acquires the lock, blocking if necessary until available.
      long sharedLock​()
      See lock().
      long tryLock​()
      Exclusively acquires the lock if it is immediately available.
      long trySharedLock​()
      See tryLock().
      void unlock​(long stamp)
      If the lock state matches the given stamp, releases the non-exclusive lock.
      void unlockShared​(long stamp)
      See unlock(long).

      • isSharedLocked

        public final boolean isSharedLocked​()
        Specified by:
        isSharedLocked in interface LockStrategy
        Returns:
        true if the lock is currently being held exclusively, false otherwise.

      • tryLock

        public final long tryLock​()
        Description copied from interface: LockStrategy
        Exclusively acquires the lock if it is immediately available.
        Specified by:
        tryLock in interface LockStrategy
        Returns:
        A stamp that can be used to unlock, or 0 if the lock is not available. If lock have been acquired, returns 1.

      • lock

        public final long lock​()
        Description copied from interface: LockStrategy
        Exclusively acquires the lock, blocking if necessary until available.
        Specified by:
        lock in interface LockStrategy
        Returns:
        A stamp (not 0) that can be used to unlock. Returns 1.

      • unlock

        public final void unlock​(long stamp)
        Description copied from interface: LockStrategy
        If the lock state matches the given stamp, releases the non-exclusive lock.
        Specified by:
        unlock in interface LockStrategy
        Parameters:
        stamp - A stamp returned by an exclusive-lock operation. Must not be 0.
